CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Inverts the direction of fling gestures, tap zones, and page turn animations
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Left-to-Right Reading

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Causes your device's screen to never shut off while you're reading
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Keep Screen On

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Pages will stop moving immediately after you lift your finger
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Scrolling Momentum

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Retains zoom level when advancing pages (starts zoomed-in at top-right corner)
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Sticky Zoom

ListPreference.android:summary: Sets how pages will be displayed when completely zoomed out (Automatic uses Fit to Width in landscape mode and Fit to Screen in portrait mode)
ListPreference.android:title: Page Scaling Mode

ListPreference.android:summary: Sets how far Mango zooms in when you double-tap the screen
ListPreference.android:title: Double-Tap Zoom Factor

ListPreference.android:summary: Sets the screen orientation while in the pagereader (Automatic uses your device's motion sensor)
ListPreference.android:title: Screen Orientation

ListPreference.android:summary: Sets how far in advance of your reading Mango downloads pages

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Allows you to use the volume buttons to change pages (Volume up = next, volume down = previous)
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Enable Volume Rocker Controls

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Turns off swipe gestures for going back and forward between pages
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Swipe Controls

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Turns off tapping on the screen to change pages
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Tap Controls

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Turns off tap zones (tapping the left side or center of the screen goes forward, tapping on the right edge goes back). Instead, tapping will always go forward.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Tap Zones

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Turns off double tap zoom.
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Double-Tap Zoom

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Hides all toolbars while reading (the Android system bar can't be completely hidden on Honeycomb/Ice Cream Sandwich, sorry)
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Full-screen Reading

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Hides the on-screen Menu button, good for devices that already have a physical menu key (only applicable on Honeycomb and up)
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Hide On-Screen Menu Button

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Stops the page number bar from appearing when switching pages
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Page Number Bar

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables animations in the Pagereader, resulting in faster page changes and less memory usage
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Page Animations

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Skips menu background compositing, making menus load slightly faster. But then you'll have ugly menus. :'(
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Menu Backgrounds

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Inverts the color scheme of Mango's menus (white text, black background). Backgrounds will be disabled. (Experimental)
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: White-on-Black Menus (beta)

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: The chapter list will be ordered from newest to oldest instead of oldest to newest
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Reverse Chapter Listing

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Stops Mango from keeping a history of chapters you open
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable History

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Inverts page color (white-on-black instead of black-on-white). Uses more memory and may cause crashes on some devices. (Experimental)
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Inverted Color Reading (beta)

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Helps make Mango even better by anonymously sending usage stats and crash information to Leetsoft
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Opt-In to Flurry Analytics

ListPreference.android:summary: Sets how often Mango clears the downloaded pages cache
ListPreference.android:title: Cache Wipe Threshold

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Uses software rendering instead of hardware-accelerated rendering on Honeycomb and up. Turn this on if pages are jagged and hard to read. (restart required)
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Force Software Rendering

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Lowers image quality while panning and zooming to make animations smoother (good for low end phones). No effect if hardware acceleration is used. (restart required)
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Fast Rendering

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Allows you to override the default location for Mango's data folder (where downloads and the cache are stored)
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Override Default Data Folder

EditTextPreference.android:summary: Specify the overridden location for the Mango data folder (must check the above box)
EditTextPreference.android:title: Set Data Folder Location

CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Disables cover art loading in the Favorites Menu to reduce jerkiness on slower devices
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Disable Favorites Cover Art
